description: Over 100,000 residents of Hong Kong marched to demand greater freedom in choosing their leaders. The protest comes on the 17th anniversary of the return of Hong Kong to Chinese rule.
title: Marchers Take To Streets Of Hong Kong To Protest Eroding Autonomy

description: Activists are threatening to blockade the city's financial district unless China allows a free and fair vote to elect Hong Kong's leader.
title: Thousands Rally In Hong Kong To Call For Democratic Vote

description: Thousands of demonstrators are expected march on Tuesday to demand greater freedom in choosing their leaders. The protest comes on the 17th anniversary of the return of Hong Kong to Chinese rule.
title: Democracy Protesters In Hong Kong Call For Free Elections
